you have noticed one

patterns in the whole universe.

disk, and all the planets

a number of things.

called the conservation
of angular momentum.

understand that gravity

There's something called the
conservation of angular momentum.

And that basically says that if
anything has any spin at all, even just

a little bit of motion, as
gravity brings it together

and makes it smaller,
that spin is accelerated.
It's sped up.

example most people know

around relatively slowly.

That is an application of the
conservation of angular momentum.
